StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [UpdateProduc.onStatus]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@PersonID as integer, @Organiza.onID as integer, @Month as integer, @Year as integer, @OnProduc.onStatus as bit, @Produc.onStatusReason varchar(5), @OtherReasonDetail varchar(50), @EndOfTourDate date.me = NULL, @UserLogin as varchar(15) AS
DECLARE @ErrMsg varchar(100)
DECLARE @DBID int SET @DBID = DB_ID()
DECLARE @DBNAME nvarchar(128) SET @DBNAME = DB_NAME()
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM PRODUCTION_STATUS_HISTORY WHERE PERSON_ID = @PersonID AND MONTH_CODE = @Month AND CALENDAR_YEAR = @Year)
UPDATE PRODUCTION_STATUS_HISTORY SET ON_PRODUCTION = @OnProduc.onStatus, NON_PROD_REASON_CODE = @Produc.onStatusReason, OTHER_REASON_DETAIL = @OtherReasonDetail, USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE PERSON_ID = @PersonID AND MONTH_CODE = @Month AND CALENDAR_YEAR = @Year
ELSE
INSERT INTO PRODUCTION_STATUS_HISTORY ( PERSON_ID, ORGANIZATION_ID, MONTH_CODE, CALENDAR_YEAR, ON_PRODUCTION, NON_PROD_REASON_CODE, OTHER_REASON_DETAIL, USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES ( @PersonID, @Organiza.onID, @Month, @Year, @OnProduc.onStatus, @Produc.onStatusReason, @OtherReasonDetail, @UserLogin, GETDATE() )
-- If the status is 'EAS','EOT','ASP','RET','RGS', or 'RFC', remove the recruiters from MCRISS by se.ng the TOUR_END_DATE IF @Produc.onStatusReason in ('EAS','EOT','ASP','RET','RGS','RFC') BEGIN
IF @EndOfTourDate IS NULL SET @EndOfTourDate = CAST(@Month as varchar(2))+'/1/'+CAST(@Year as varchar(4))
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- Remove this recruiter from sector assignments ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- DECLARE @RECRUITING_PERSON_GUID uniqueiden..er
SELECT @RECRUITING_PERSON_GUID = rowguid FROM [MCRISS].[dbo].[RECRUITING_PERSON] WHERE RECRUITING_PERSON_ID=@PersonID
DECLARE @USER_GUID uniqueiden..er
SELECT TOP(1) @USER_GUID = [UserID] FROM [UserMgmt].[dbo].[User] WHERE [Username] like @UserLogin + '%' AND [IsAc.ve] = 1 ORDER BY [LastAc.vityDate] DESC
IF @USER_GUID = null BEGIN SET @USER_GUID = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' END
EXEC [RSSOSS].[USMC].[InsertUpdateMapsSectorRecruiter] @SectorRecruiterId = null, @SectorID = null, @Recrui.ngPersonId = @RECRUITING_PERSON_GUID, @LastUpdateUserId = @USER_GUID ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
UPDATE RECRUITING_PERSON SET TOUR_END_DATE = @EndOfTourDate, USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GetDate() WHERE RECRUITING_PERSON_ID = @PersonId
IF @@ERROR != 0 BEGIN SET @ErrMsg = 'An error occurred se.ng the tour end date.' RAISERROR (@ErrMsg, 16, 1, @DBID, @DBNAME) RETURN END END
